languages.text: "Пошли, Арильд" {n}— старая женщина устало берет мужа за руку.{/n} "Может, сможем внуков найти и посидеть с ними напоследок. А нет, так значит... просто побудем вдвоем".

"Let's go, Aryld." {n}The old woman takes her husband by the hand wearily.{/n} "Perhaps we'll find our grandchildren and sit with them one last time. And if we don't... then it'll just be the two of us."
languages.original_text: "Пошли, Арильд" {n}— старая женщина устало берет мужа за руку.{/n} "Может, сможем внуков найти и посидеть с ними напоследок. А нет, так значит... просто побудем вдвоем".

traits.locale_text: "Let's go, Aryld." {n}The old woman takes her husband by the hand wearily.{/n} "Perhaps we'll find our grandchildren and sit down with them for one last time. And if we don't... then it'll just be the two of us."

"Let's go, Aryld." {n}The old woman takes her husband by the hand wearily.{/n} "Perhaps we'll find our grandchildren and sit down with them for one last time. And if we don't... then it'll just be the two of us."

"Let's go, Aryld." {n}The old woman takes her husband by the hand wearily.{/n} "Perhaps we'll find our grandchildren and spend time with them one last time. And if we don't... then it'll just be the two of us."

"Let's go, Aryld." {n}The old woman takes her husband by the hand wearily.{/n} "Perhaps we'll find our grandchildren and spend time with them one last time. And if we don't... then it'll just be the two of us."

"Let's go, Aryld." {n}The old woman takes her husband by the hand wearily.{/n} "Perhaps we'll find our grandchildren and sit with them one last time. And if we don't... then it'll just be the two of us."

"Let's go, Aryld." {n}The old woman takes her husband by the hand wearily.{/n} "Perhaps we'll find our grandchildren and sit with them one last time. And if we don't... then it'll just be the two of us."

languages.text: "Gehen wir, Aryld." {n}Die alte Frau nimmt ihren Mann misstrauisch bei der Hand.{/n} "Vielleicht finden wir unsere Enkel und können noch ein letztes Mal Zeit mit ihnen verbringen. Und wenn nicht ... dann sind wir eben zu zweit."
languages.original_text: "Let's go, Aryld." {n}The old woman takes her husband by the hand wearily.{/n} "Perhaps we'll find our grandchildren and sit with them one last time. And if we don't... then it'll just be the two of us."

traits.locale_text: "Gehen wir, Aryld." {n}Die alte Frau nimmt ihren Mann misstrauisch bei der Hand.{/n} "Vielleicht finden wir unsere Enkel und können noch ein letztes Mal Zeit mit ihnen verbringen. Und wenn nicht ... dann sind wir eben zu zweit."

languages.text: « Allons-y, Aryld, {n}lance la vieille femme en prenant la main de son mari d'un air las.{/n} On pourra peut-être trouver nos petits-enfants et passer du temps avec eux une dernière fois. Autrement... il n'y aura plus que toi et moi. »
languages.original_text: "Let's go, Aryld." {n}The old woman takes her husband by the hand wearily.{/n} "Perhaps we'll find our grandchildren and sit with them one last time. And if we don't... then it'll just be the two of us."

traits.locale_text: « Allons-y, Aryld, {n}lance la vieille femme en prenant la main de son mari d'un air las.{/n} On pourra peut-être trouver nos petits-enfants et passer du temps avec eux une dernière fois. Autrement... il n'y aura plus que toi et moi. »

languages.text: “咱们走吧，艾瑞德。”{n}老妇人疲惫地拉起她丈夫的手。{/n}“或许咱们还能找到咱们的孙辈，和他们共度最后的时光。如果找不到的话……那就只剩咱们两个了。”
languages.original_text: "Let's go, Aryld." {n}The old woman takes her husband by the hand wearily.{/n} "Perhaps we'll find our grandchildren and sit with them one last time. And if we don't... then it'll just be the two of us."

traits.locale_text: “咱们走吧，艾瑞德。”{n}老妇人疲惫地拉起她丈夫的手。{/n}“或许咱们还能找到咱们的孙辈，和他们共度最后的时光。如果找不到的话……那就只剩咱们两个了。”

languages.text: 「行きましょう、アリルド」{n}老女は疲れ切ったように夫の手を取る。{/n}「孫たちに会って、最後の時間を過ごすことにしましょう。もしできない場合は…私たち二人きりね」
languages.original_text: "Let's go, Aryld." {n}The old woman takes her husband by the hand wearily.{/n} "Perhaps we'll find our grandchildren and sit with them one last time. And if we don't... then it'll just be the two of us."

traits.locale_text: 「行きましょう、アリルド」{n}老女は疲れ切ったように夫の手を取る。{/n}「孫たちに会って、最後の時間を過ごすことにしましょう。もしできない場合は…私たち二人きりね」

languages.text: «Vamos, Aryld». {n}La anciana coge a su marido de la mano con cansancio.{/n} «Con suerte encontraremos a nuestros nietos y podremos sentarnos con ellos por última vez. Y si no lo hacemos... entonces estaremos los dos juntos».
languages.original_text: "Let's go, Aryld." {n}The old woman takes her husband by the hand wearily.{/n} "Perhaps we'll find our grandchildren and sit with them one last time. And if we don't... then it'll just be the two of us."

traits.locale_text: «Vamos, Aryld». {n}La anciana coge a su marido de la mano con cansancio.{/n} «Con suerte encontraremos a nuestros nietos y podremos pasar tiempo con ellos por última vez. Y si no lo hacemos... entonces estaremos los dos juntos».

languages.text: "Gidelim Aryld." {n}Yaşlı kadın, kocasının elini bitkinlikle tutuyor.{/n} "Belki torunlarımızı bulur, onlarla son bir defa otururuz. Bulamazsak da... Sağlık olsun, ikimiz varız ya."
languages.original_text: "Let's go, Aryld." {n}The old woman takes her husband by the hand wearily.{/n} "Perhaps we'll find our grandchildren and sit with them one last time. And if we don't... then it'll just be the two of us."

traits.locale_text: "Gidelim Aryld." {n}Yaşlı kadın, kocasının elini bitkin hâlde tutuyor.{/n} "Belki torunlarımızı bulur, son defa beraber sofraya otururuz. Bulamazsak da sağlık olsun, ikimiz varız ya."
